features.title: Why Choose Bioenneagram?
features.subtitle: Each of the following features represents Bioenneagram's value proposition.

items.title: Experience real and lasting change in your life with our services
items.description: From individual therapies to personal development retreats, every intervention is designed to deliver tangible results. Achieve your wellness and personal growth goals efficiently and meaningfully.

items.title: Trust a professional dedicated to your wellbeing
items.description: Highly trained and committed to providing quality service. Professionalism is reflected in every interaction, from therapeutic sessions to workshops and conferences, providing a trusting and respectful environment.

items.title: Your peace of mind is our priority
items.description: We create environments that foster calmness and tranquility. Whether you're participating in individual therapy or a relaxing retreat, our goal is for you to feel peaceful and harmonious. Here, you'll find a safe space to explore and grow.

items.title: Embrace your path to personal development
items.description: We offer not only therapies, but also retreats, workshops and courses designed to nurture your growth. Each experience is crafted to unlock your potential and foster comprehensive development in all areas of your life.

items.title: Wellbeing shouldn't be an unattainable luxury
items.description: We strive to make our services accessible to all. Affordability doesn't mean compromising quality; it means everyone deserves access to resources that promote wellbeing. Discover how caring for your mental health can be an affordable and valuable investment in your life.

contentSections.mainSubtitle: Dive into a journey to your inner world and experience transformation. Explore how Bioenneagram's tailored solutions are key to driving success in diverse contexts, from boosting corporate changes to rekindling romantic sparks and empowering individual growth.

items.testimonial: My experience with BioEnneagram has been truly transformative. In just a few sessions, I've experienced significant change in my perspective and how I handle life's challenges. I highly recommend this therapy to anyone seeking positive, lasting change.

My life has taken a positive turn, and I couldn't be more thankful for this transformative experience.
items.name: Juan David Cardona

items.testimonial: After participating in BioEnneagram sessions, I finally feel connected to my true self. The enneagram and biodescoding have provided deep insight into my emotional blocks and how to overcome them. The coach has been an exceptional guide on this journey of self-discovery. My life perspective has changed, and I'm experiencing an inner peace I never thought possible.

callToActionWidget.title: Let's Create Together
callToActionWidget.subtitle: Ready to make meaningful change in your life?

items.title: What is Bioenneagram and how does it differ from biodescoding and enneagram separately?
items.description: Bioenneagram is a unique integration of biodescoding and enneagram. It combines the power of biodescoding to understand emotional connections with the enneagram to explore personality patterns. This synergy provides a more complete view of how past experiences impact our current personality and behavior.

items.title: What does biodescoding entail and how can it benefit me?
items.description: Biodescoding is a therapeutic approach that seeks to understand the connection between emotions and health. It works by unraveling the emotional meaning of physical or emotional symptoms. Experiencing biodescoding can help you understand and release emotional patterns that may be affecting your wellbeing.

items.title: Is prior experience with biodescoding or enneagram required to participate in Bioenneagram sessions?
items.description: No prior experience is needed. Bioenneagram sessions are designed for all familiarity levels with biodescoding and enneagram. Our professionals will guide you through the process, ensuring you feel comfortable and understand each stage.

items.title: How is the enneagram used in your services?
items.description: The enneagram is a powerful self-knowledge tool we use to understand personality patterns and motivations. We offer specific enneagram sessions and workshops to help you discover your type and apply this knowledge in daily life.

items.title: Do you offer online services?
items.description: Yes, some of our services are available online. This provides flexibility for those who prefer to participate from home. Contact us for more details about online availability.
